title: Ex-cricketer Dhammika Prasad begins 24-hour hunger strike
body_lines: Former Sri Lanka cricketer Dhammika Prasad began a 24-hour hunger strike this morning at the Galle Face Green in Colombo.

He said he will engage in a 24-hour hunger strike urging the leaders of this country to deliver justice to Easter Sunday attack victims and people of Sri Lanka who are suffering from the current economic crisis.
Last week, he also organised a protest march from Katuwapitiya church to Kochchikade church urging authorities to deliver justice to the Easter Sunday attacks victims. (DSBi)
